mobile.name: deer
mobile.long_description: A deer looks at you with fear in its eyes.
mobile.description: That is one nice looking deer!

mobile.name: rabbit
mobile.long_description: A small rabbit nibbles at a leaf here.
mobile.description: It is a small, furry rodent with big ears.

mobile.name: squirrel
mobile.long_description: A squirrel spots you and runs around a tree!
mobile.description: It is a small, brown squirrel. Kind of like a fuzzy high-tension spring.

mobile.name: orc hunter
mobile.long_description: An orc hunter looks at you with hateful eyes.
mobile.description: He looks angry, desperate, and maybe a little sick. His green skin is definitely mottled, and he seems to limp a little bit...

mobile.name: orc chief
mobile.long_description: An orc chief growls at you!
mobile.description: He wears a crown of oak leaves to show he is a leader. He carries a club to show he is a warrior. You wonder how good he is at both.

mobile.name: orc woman
mobile.long_description: An orc woman stands here, frightened of you.
mobile.description: As you stare her down, she raises her hands slowly, as if to say, 'Don't kill me'.

mobile.name: orc child
mobile.long_description: An orc child frantically searches for her mother.
mobile.description: She is raggedy, and seems to be covered with sores.

mobile.name: orc woman
mobile.long_description: A pregnant orc woman tries to stand to flee from you.
mobile.description: She is too far gone to move very quickly. You could kill her easily.

mobile.name: orc mutant mutated
mobile.long_description: A mutant orc lies here, barely alive.
mobile.description: Its body has been twisted beyond all hope. It is dying, and nothing will stop that.

mobile.name: orc mutant mutated
mobile.long_description: A horribly mutated orc stands here, gibbering.
mobile.description: It doesn't even appear to have registered your arrival... it is just talking to itself. Its body is a twisted wreck of orc, man, beast, and what-not.

mobile.name: wizard elf elven Elstar
mobile.long_description: An elven wizard is here. He looks angry.
mobile.description: He looks at you archly as he wonders why you have invaded his domain. No matter... it shouldn't be too hard for him to destroy you, no?

mobile.name: child elf elven apprentice
mobile.long_description: An elven child casts his fishing pole into the river.
mobile.description: He looks young and innocent. You wonder what he is doing here.

mobile.name: mutant thing
mobile.long_description: A mutant... thing rushes at you!
mobile.description: It might've been an orc, once. Now it is a living terror, pushing everything out of its way to get at you.

mobile.name: mutant thing
mobile.long_description: A mutant... thing tries to get you, but cannot move into range!
mobile.description: It might have been an orc, once. Now it is a living terror, pushing everything out of its way to get at you.
